overview:
Marc Gingras is Chief Executive Officer and Founder of Tungle. Prior to founding Tungle, Gingras was Vice President of Business Development and Product Marketing for Nimcat Networks until its acquisition by Avaya Inc. in September 2005. Prviously, he was a venture capitalist at Innovatech Montreal.

Prior to joining Innovatech, Gingras co-founded Gytek Inc., an e-commerce software company in Waterloo, Canada, which he eventually sold to Entrade Inc., a NYSE company. He remained with Entrade as Chief Technology Officer. Marc also managed the launch of “Chapters.ca “, a leading Canadian portal.

Source:Tungle
